StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: Specialist with more than 1.8 years of success in designing 3D maps and Navigation for Automated Vehicles in Information Technology and Services. Also Completed Certification course of AWS Cloud Computing.

PositionHistory.Title: Earthscape, Map Editor
PositionHistory.Description: as Spatial Data specialist I Jun 2018 to Till Date Development of 3D Maps, which are primarily being used in premium vehicles such as AUDI, JAGUAR, BMW etc. For Automated Driving and Driverless Car systems as well as in Mobile Applications. Working on different workflows and tools internal to the company (Earthscape, Map Editor, Flow Metric, Flex Labeling, feature expansion, VMWARE, etc.) Digitize mapping database using required platform/tools as per defined process and Maintain performance report of team members and help them with their difficulties to increase their performance. Performing quality checks on data inputs to test validity of data as per standards. Maintaining MDI board for projects and to keeping up the work with quality and doing update sessions regularly as per required growth in the performance. Achieving target on Time with Quality with the Team which created End products.
